response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation and excellence, tailored to meet your specific needs and desires. Given its exceptional value and quality, we believe it is worth $1,200,000 to you. We are offering this remarkable piece at a special introductory price of $1,100,000, hoping to facilitate a mutually beneficial transaction. Should you choose to accept this offer, we assure you of unparalleled customer service and support throughout the process. Thank you for considering our proposal, and we look forward to the possibility of serving you.", "product_price": 1100000}
